attributes.action: Suspend visa requirements for all Ukrainian citizens
attributes.additional_details: Ukrainians are fleeing Russian aggression. Many are being refused entry to the UK despite substantial family ties. It is a moral imperative to help Ukrainians to safety.
attributes.background: Russia has invaded Ukraine, creating a refugee crisis. Allow all Ukrainian citizens visa-free travel to the UK.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
